creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Gene Perrine
description: squat vessel with two ridges; vessel tapers towards bottom, and flattens at top with a small opening; indented, angled cigarette rest on top; deep blue glaze with black and copper flecks; brown inside
markings: label taped to bottom center: [Kawai K. Ash Tray / Extra good (?)]
title: (Ash Tray)
